title: Comfort Colors 6014 Long Sleeve Tee — Sample Design
description:
A heavyweight long sleeve built for comfort and durability, this tee has a laid-back vintage vibe thanks to its garment-dyed finish. With its soft hand-feel and relaxed fit, it’s perfect for layering or wearing on its own when temps drop. Designed to last and get better with every wash.

- 100% ring-spun cotton (heathers include polyester)
- Fabric weight: 6.1 oz/yd² (206 g/m²)
- Garment-dyed for a lived-in look
- Relaxed unisex fit
- Crew neck with topstitched collar
- Ribbed cuffs
- Double-needle stitched neck, armholes, and bottom hem
- Preshrunk and soft-washed for comfort
- Blank product sourced from Honduras

title: AS Colour 5001T Premium Tee — Holy Rollers
description: Elevated basic with a clean drape. Midweight cotton, ribbed collar, side-seamed, preshrunk.

title: Bella + Canvas 3001 Unisex Tee — Like & Share
description:
A soft, everyday unisex tee made with 100% combed and ring-spun cotton. Lightweight, breathable, and preshrunk for consistent fit.

- 100% combed and ring-spun cotton (heathers include polyester)
- Fabric weight: 4.2 oz/yd² (142 g/m²)
- Retail fit
- Unisex sizing
- Shoulder taping
- Side-seamed construction
- Blank product sourced from Nicaragua, Honduras, or the US
